### Installation

```bash
go get github.com/go-fork/di@v${version}
```

### Verification

```bash
go mod download github.com/go-fork/di@v${version}
go mod verify
```

**Note**: This release has been tested with Go versions 1.21, 1.22, and 1.23 on Linux, macOS, and Windows.
